title: RAW EMOTIONS
description: RAW EMOTIONS IS FILLED WITH JUST WHAT THE TITLES SAYS. IF YOU EVER BEEN DOWN AND OUT AND PEOPLE WHOM YOU KNOW AND DON'T KNOW KICK DIRTY IN YOUR FACE AND LET YOU DOWN THEN THIS IS THE BOOK FOR YOU. IT'S FILLED WITH ALL TYPES OF EMOTIONS THAT WE ALL AS PEOPLE FEEL EVERYDAY OF OUR LIVES.RAW EMOTION IS RAW TO THE BONE AND GRITTY FROM START TO FINISH. IT'S NOT FOR THE FAINT HEART. RAW EMOTION WAS WRITTEN BY NYC BEST SELLING AUTHOR AND BROOKLYN NEW YORKER VERY OWN ROBERT MARSH ALSO KNOWN AS RJ MARSH.
author: Robert    Marsh
